Text: You are the best.....Thank you for your time.

Your uploads are great quality and very much appreciated!

The only thing extra I could ask you to include in your descriptions in future is the aspect ratio.

Again... many thanks!

Oh... and whether the movie is PAL or NTSC format, which you've apparently accidently left out of some of the descriptions.

Top notch though in anycase!
Great Copy, thanks.  Although the storyline you've added kind of spoils the film for anyone who hasnt seen it....more or less tells you whats going to happen :-(
